roleset.name: agreed upon by both parties

example.name: arg1
example.text: Note that in both cases the sex was consensual , obviously not legally , but in the sense that there was n't any physical compulsion .
example.arg: obviously not legally, but in the sense that there wasn't any physical compulsion

example.name: both args
example.text: Mr. Hicks vehemently asserts that all conduct that occurred during the evening of the incident was consensual by everyone involved
example.arg: all conduct that occurred during the evening of the incident

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, consent-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls settle-89.

example.name: arg1
example.text: Pupils equal , round , regular , reactive to light , direct and consensual .
